entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Meadow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:14 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Meadow Lake Airport 2:49 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:10 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 11:10 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
